CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Security policies and settings for devices enrolled with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Expand coverage & provide additional capabilities to provide a single unified pane of glass for managing the security settings of any device with Microsoft Defender.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Security policies and settings for devices enrolled with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: ,Expand coverage & provide additional capabilities to provide a single unified pane of glass for managing the security settings of any device with Microsoft Defender.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows 11 update readiness reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
App and driver compatibility reports for Windows update planning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows 11 update readiness reports
OldVersion.description: ,App and driver compatibility reports for Windows update planning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Advanced Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Data science and AI powered automation, recommendations and insights enable IT to proactively improve user experiences based on endpoint health and performance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Advanced Endpoint analytics
OldVersion.description: Data science and AI powered automation, recommendations and insights enable IT to proactively improve user experiences based on endpoint health and performance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Frosted Glass Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Frosted Glass is a type of background effect that helps users keep their privacy with a background blur, but in a more professional and creative way. It let users have graphics with a blur effect together. Frosted Glass can be activated with a PNG image, that usually comes with some graphics in a transparent background. With the new frosted glass effects, the transparent area is turned into a blur background while the graphic remains as the part of background effect. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Frosted Glass Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
OldVersion.description: Frosted Glass is a type of background effect that helps users keep their privacy with a background blur, but in a more professional and creative way. It let users have graphics with a blur effect together. Frosted Glass can be activated with a PNG image, that usually comes with some graphics in a transparent background. With the new frosted glass effects, the transparent area is turned into a blur background while the graphic remains as the part of background effect. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9 videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit action.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a
maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web
browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9
videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit
action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Bitlocker end user key retrieval
CurrentVersion.description: As an end user, you can view the BitLocker recovery key for devices which you are the owner using the Company Portal website.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Bitlocker end user key retrieval
OldVersion.description: As an end user, you can view the BitLocker recovery key for devices which you are the owner using the Company Portal website.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed device attestation
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancing Windows compliance policy - device health: adding 5 additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 - using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, Firmware protection, Virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed device attestation
OldVersion.description: Enhancing Windows compliance policy - device health: adding 5 additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 - using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, Firmware protection, Virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed. Note: We have updated the release phase to reflect the current state as we are evaluating this release and have paused the rollout. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed. Note: We have updated the release phase to reflect the current state as we are evaluating this release and have paused the rollout. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to change retention period on labels set to start retention based on “When items were labeled”
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, admins could not change the retention period set on existing labels configured to start retention from when items were labeled. This feature will remove this restriction, and the resulting behavior will be consistent with other retention label types.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to change retention period on labels set to start retention based on “When items were labeled”
OldVersion.description:
Previously, admins could not change the
retention period set on existing labels configured to start retention from when
items were labeled. This feature will remove this restriction, and the
resulting behavior will be consistent with other retention label types.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Performance improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will provide faster page load times when using OneDrive for Web or when using the Files app in Teams irrespective of your network speed. You will see faster screen loading, sorting, filtering, file moving, and renaming. This increase in speed is made possible by storing file metadata in the local cache of your device as opposed to requesting it from the cloud service.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Performance improvements
OldVersion.description: ,This feature will provide faster page load times when using OneDrive for Web or when using the Files app in Teams irrespective of your network speed. You will see faster screen loading, sorting, filtering, file moving, and renaming. This increase in speed is made possible by storing file metadata in the local cache of your device as opposed to requesting it from the cloud service.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
OldVersion.description: ,This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Files On-Demand for Web
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Files On-Demand options of “Always keep on this device” and “Free up space” will soon be made available on OneDrive for Web for your synced files. You will be able to select files and folders to be always available offline on your device directly from within the browser without having to navigate away to File Explore or Finder to perform this action. OneDrive will download these, and they'll take up space on your computer. You will also be able to “Free up space” by selecting a file or folder that you previously marked as "Always keep on this device", and they will no longer take up local storage space.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Files On-Demand for Web
OldVersion.description: ,The Files On-Demand options of “Always keep on this device” and “Free up space” will soon be made available on OneDrive for Web for your synced files. You will be able to select files and folders to be always available offline on your device directly from within the browser without having to navigate away to File Explore or Finder to perform this action. OneDrive will download these, and they'll take up space on your computer. You will also be able to “Free up space” by selecting a file or folder that you previously marked as "Always keep on this device", and they will no longer take up local storage space.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Lead-Lag in task dependencies
CurrentVersion.description: Set advancement and delay between tasks in your project.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Lead-Lag in task dependencies
OldVersion.description: Set advancement and delay between tasks in your project.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
OldVersion.description: ,This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
OldVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
OldVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Supports live data sync to Excel
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Forms supports quickly and easily syncing form responses to an Excel file. Now you’ll always have the latest information, updated automatically, so you can leverage the full range of Excel functions to analyze your data and collab with your peers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Facilitate effortless sharing of goals and goal progress with the enhanced sharing functionality in Viva Goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
OldVersion.description: Facilitate effortless sharing of goals and goal progress with the enhanced sharing functionality in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
CurrentVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, this will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up-to-date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Styles
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to choose between three different text styles, allowing greater flexibility and personalization of text in whiteboards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: System based Alerting on Microsoft Intune
CurrentVersion.description: An administrator can configure alerts and notifications specific to Windows 365 Cloud PCs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: System based Alerting on Microsoft Intune
OldVersion.description: An administrator can configure alerts and notifications specific to Windows 365 Cloud PCs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Apps for Teams meetings available in Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Now, you can configure or add an app for Teams meetings while scheduling a meeting from Outlook. This app will be ready to use when you chat or join the meeting in Teams.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Apps for Teams meetings available in Classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description:
,Now, you can configure or add an app for Teams
meetings while scheduling a meeting from Outlook. This app will be ready to use
when you chat or join the meeting in Teams.
